languages.text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Follower
Each {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} used in battle increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by +20% until the end of combat (max 60%).
languages.original_text:
Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматик{/g} — последователь
Каждый {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g}, использованный в бою, увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} владельца мантии на 20% до конца боя (макс. 60%).

traits.locale_text:
Requires Benevolentia — Follower
Each {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} used in battle increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} by +20% until the end of combat (max 60%).

Each {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} used in battle increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by +20% until the end of combat (max 60%).

Each {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} used in battle increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by +20% until the end of combat (max 60%).

languages.text:
Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматик{/g} — последователь
Каждый {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g}, использованный в бою, увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} владельца мантии на 20% до конца боя (макс. 60%).
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Follower
Each {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} used in battle increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by +20% until the end of combat (max 60%).

languages.text:
Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ikonoklast{/g} — Jünger
Jede {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g}, die im Kampf eingesetzt wird, erhöht den {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}-Wert des Trägers bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +20 % (maximal 60 %).
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Follower
Each {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} used in battle increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by +20% until the end of combat (max 60%).

traits.locale_text:
Erfordert Benevolentia – Jünger
Jede {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g}, die im Kampf eingesetzt wird, erhöht das {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} des Trägers bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +20 % (maximal 60 %).

languages.text:
Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclaste{/g} — Serviteur.
Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} utilisé au combat augmente l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} de l'utilisateur de 20 % jusqu'à la fin du combat (max 60 %).
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Follower
Each {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} used in battle increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by +20% until the end of combat (max 60%).

traits.locale_text:
Requiert Benevolentia — Serviteur.
Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} utilisé au combat augmente l'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} de l'utilisateur de +20 % jusqu'à la fin du combat (max 60 %).

languages.text:
需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}自由主义{/g}——追随者
每当任何队伍成员在战斗中使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}后，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}都会提高20%（最多提高60%），效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Follower
Each {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} used in battle increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by +20% until the end of combat (max 60%).

traits.locale_text:
需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}自由主义{/g}——追随者
每当任何队伍成员在战斗中使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}后，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}都会提高20%（最多提高60%），效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}革新主義{/g} ― 信者が必要
戦闘中に使用された{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}は戦闘終了まで使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を+20%上げる（最大60%）。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Follower
Each {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} used in battle increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by +20% until the end of combat (max 60%).

traits.locale_text:
ベネボレンティア ― 信者が必要
戦闘中に使用された{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を使用する度、戦闘終了まで自身の{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}が+20%（最大60%）

languages.text:
Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclasta{/g}: Seguidor
Cada {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} que se use en la batalla aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} del portador un +20 % hasta el final del combate (máximo 60 %).
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Follower
Each {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} used in battle increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by +20% until the end of combat (max 60%).

traits.locale_text:
Requiere Benevolentia: Seguidor
Cada {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} que se use en la batalla aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} del portador un +20 % hasta el final del combate (máximo 60 %).

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ezber Bozan{/g} — Takipçi kanaati gerektirir
Çatışmada kullanılan her {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylem{/g}, takan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değerini +%20 (maks. %60) artırır. Etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Follower
Each {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} used in battle increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by +20% until the end of combat (max 60%).
